import React from "react"; import Slider from "react-slick"; import Restaurants from "../../assets/images/Restaurants.png" import Pharmacie from "../../assets/images/pharmacien.png" import Cafes from "../../assets/images/Cafes.png" import Hotels from "../../assets/images/Hotels.png" import Agencevoyages from "../../assets/images/agences-voyages.png" const Testimonials = () => { const settings = { dots:true, infinite:true, autoPlay:true, speed:1000, swipeToSlide:true, autoplaySpeed:2000, slidesToShow:3, responsive:[ { breakpoint: 992, settings: { slidesToShow: 2, slidesToScroll:1, infinite:true, dots:true }, }, { breakpoint: 576, settings: { slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll:1, }, }, ] } return (
RESTAURANTS
PHARMACIES
CAFES
HOTELS
CAFES
 ); }; export default Testimonials;
